meanings.definition: A dirty or shabby person or place.
meanings.sent1: The homeless man looked like a real fleabag.
meanings.sent2: The old abandoned house was a real fleabag.
meanings.sent3: The stray dog made the park his fleabag home.
meanings.sent4: The alley behind the restaurant was a fleabag hideout for rats.
meanings.sent5: The rundown shack in the woods was the ultimate fleabag hideaway.

meanings.definition: A cheap or run-down hotel or lodging.
meanings.sent1: We stayed at a fleabag motel on our road trip.
meanings.sent2: The fleabag inn had seen better days.
meanings.sent3: The family reluctantly checked into the fleabag hotel for the night.
meanings.sent4: The fleabag hostel was a last resort for weary travelers.
meanings.sent5: The travelers regretted booking a room at the fleabag lodge.

meanings.sent1: Don't be such a fleabag and help out.

meanings.sent3: The rude customer was a real fleabag to the waiter.
